Effect.en: You can only control 1 "Hoárr, Generaider Boss of Rumbling". Once per turn, if your opponent adds a card(s) from the Main Deck to the hand, except during the Draw Phase: You can make your opponent send 1 monster from their hand or field to the GY. When a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 2 "Generaider" monsters and/or Spellcaster monsters; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. You can only use this effect of "Hoárr, Generaider Boss of Rumbling" once per turn.

en: Make the opponent send 1 monster to the GY
